General.Name: Heiwa Corporation
General.Description: Heiwa Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells pachinko and pachislot machines in Japan. It is also involved in the golf course management and restoration business. The company was formerly known as Heiwa Kogyo Co., Ltd. Heiwa Corporation was founded in 1949 and is based in Tokyo, Japan.
